issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.82:1. Recommendation:  change background to #79a10c.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.82:1. Recommendation:  change background to #79a10c.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h2

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).
